title: Jayce does not need BIG buffs
body:
Jayce is in a good state. He just happens to require a lot of games to be good at. In order to play him at a high level, you have to be reliably consistent with him, but he has a really good payoff. I think if you guys try to buff his damage too much or buff him in general too much, he's going to be broken and toxic to play against. If you feel he needs a buff, I think give him a smaller buff than a 40% ad scaling on auto. He does not need that big of a buff. Either reduce the scaling by a good margin, or pick a different, smaller buff.

Also good call on reverted the 4second cd on his R. That would've been busted. 
I don't want to see a high skill champ with high pay off get ruined because he ends up getting over nerfed from over buffs. You can't look at play rates with Jayce because he requires such a high amount of skill to play. You have to put in more time than most champions to be good at him.

replies.body:
We're with you, small buff is the goal here. The R change does look pretty sizeable on paper, it's bonus AD only though on a champion who itemizes Mana, Pen and CDR as well as AD however. Total amount of damage added isn't as dramatic as you'd initially predict as a result. It's also dependent on Jayce actually getting into melee and cooldown limited (every 12s without CDR assuming you're swapping as soon as you can which often isn't optimal). 

It's also still in testing of course. From memory it's showing some good promise without the issues the previous change (R CD reduced) created, still got a few days of development time before we have to lock the patch though so conceivable it could still change.

Can you rescale thundering blow's % hp from 8-20% to 10-20%? Those decimals in between ranks really triggers me.
On a more serious note, the mana cost buff really doesn't do anything for him ever since it got relegated to third max, but nice to see a revert. Furthermore why does he need such a high cooldown on to the skies (melee Q) at earlier levels? I think making its cooldown scale more smoothly would incentivise more early trades with hammer form.
And at the same time, rescale his Hypercharge to 70-120 %... The 8 % extra damage per rank just look stupid. Small tweaks really, but cleaner numbers are preferred
Why not switching his hammer form (passive buff thingy included) ratios from "Bonus AD" into "Total AD"? So he can be viable as a melee bruiser as well, rather than only an ADC/Assassin wannabe?

Speaking of small buffs, could we get some love for Shyvana? After the sated rework the ap ratio "buffs" were a slap in the face, and the fury gain buffs really don't do anything for her. Perhaps buff q ad ratio in lower ranks a little bit, or even just revert the q nerfs that made sense when she could build devourer?

Ahhh, that's a relief! Yah the R CD was a massive buff. Hopefully if it is too strong, then it will just be tuned back a bit rather than nerfing other abilities. I think I didn't read that it was bonus AD at first, so I was thinking about how the Hammer Q - Auto -Thunderlords damage might be too toxic in lane phase. But jayce doesn't build hardly any bonus AD when it would matter most, because tear, so it should be good as just a small mid/late game buff.
